title: Learning Design Based on Professional Development for Engineering Education Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Strengthening engineering education implementation capabilities for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can design an engineering problem-solving process based on professional development theories
Learners can implement a problem-based learning (PBL) instructional model through learner-centered activities
Learners can design and operate a formative assessment system utilizing digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
